title: Principles of Corporate Finance 11th Edition c2014 Brealy et al
description:
Principles of Corporate Finance, 11th Edition (c2014), textbook by Richard A. Brealey, Stewart C. Myers & Franklin Allen.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0078034760/information_center_view0/index.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://highered.mheducation.com/sites/0078034760/information_center_view0/index.html</a>
(ISBN-10: 0078034760)

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
PART 1 - Value
 1. Introduction to Corporate Finance
 2. How to Calculate Present Values
 3. Valuing Bonds
 4. The Value of Common Stocks
 5. Net Present Value and Other Investment Criteria
 6. Making Investment Decisions with the Net Present Value Rule
PART 2 - Risk
 7. Introduction to Risk and Return
 8. Portfolio Theory and the Capital Asset Pricing Model
 9. Risk and the Cost of Capital
PART 3 - Best Practices in Capital Budgeting
 10. Project Analysis
 11. Investment, Strategy, and Economic Rents
 12. Agency Problems, Compensation, and Performance Measurement
PART 4 - Financing Decisions and Market Efficiency
 13. Efficient Markets and Behavioral Finance
 14. An Overview of Corporate Financing
 15. How Corporations Issue Securities
PART 5 - Payout Policy and Capital Structure
 16. Payout Policy
 17. Does Debt Policy Matter?
 18. How Much Should a Corporation Borrow?
 19. Financing and Valuation
PART 6 - Options
 20. Understanding Options
 21. Valuing Options
 22. Real Options
PART 7 - Debt Financing
 23. Credit Risk and the Value of Corporate Debt
 24. The Many Different Kinds of Debt
 25. Leasing
PART 8 - Risk Management
 26. Managing Risk
 27. Managing International Risks
PART 9 - Financial Planning and Working Capital Management
 28. Financial Analysis
 29. Financial Planning
 30. Working Capital Management
PART 10 - Mergers, Corporate Control, and Governance
 31. Mergers
 32. Corporate Restructuring
 33. Governance and Corporate Control Around the World
PART 11 - Conclusion
 34. Conclusion: What We Do and Do Not Know about Finance
* Present Value Tables
* Additional Appendices:
   CH 02: Foundations of the NPV Rule for OLC
   CH 09: Certainty Equivalents
   CH 19: Cost of Capital Formulas
   CH 29: Formulas for Optimal Order Size
(* WEB-only material appended for convenience)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF
